allow: Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres:BVQjtsVwITqJKqdwOhgRLQwaWdeTXKgp@nozomi.proxy.rlwy.net:39235/railway" -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, COUNT(launch_speed) as with_launch_speed, COUNT(CASE WHEN launch_speed IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) as pct_with_data FROM milb_batter_pitches WHERE season = 2025 AND mlb_batter_id IN (805811, 804606, 701350, 692225)")

Bash(psql "postgresql://postgres:BVQjtsVwITqJKqdwOhgRLQwaWdeTXKgp@nozomi.proxy.rlwy.net:39235/railway" -c "
SELECT 
    p.name, 
    p.mlb_player_id,
    COUNT(DISTINCT bp.game_pk) as games_with_pitches,
    COUNT(*) as total_pitches,
    MIN(bp.game_date) as first_date,
    MAX(bp.game_date) as last_date
FROM prospects p
LEFT JOIN milb_batter_pitches bp ON p.mlb_player_id::integer = bp.mlb_batter_id
WHERE p.name ILIKE ''%made%'' OR p.name ILIKE ''%jesus%''
GROUP BY p.name, p.mlb_player_id
ORDER BY p.name;
")
